startGreeting:
Hello there\! 👋
I'm your Crypto Alert Buddy 📈
availableCommands: Take a look to all the available commands 👇
sendNewSignalTitle: Ok, let's create a new signal 📈
sendNewSignalCoinPair: Send me the coin pair you want to track (for example: BTC/USDT)
sendNewSignalEntryPrice: Send me the ENTRY PRICE (for example: 10000)
sendNewSignalTakeProfit: Send me the TAKE PROFIT PRICE (for example: 11000)
sendNewSignalStopLoss: Send me the STOP LOSS PRICE (for example: 9000)
sendNewSignalConfirm: Ok, I've created a new signal for you 🚀
sendNewSignalError:
Sorry, something went wrong.
I couldn't create your signal 🙈
